title: Am I the only person that wants a zombie apocalypse to happen, or is okay with it happening? (Walking Dead style, not WWZ or anything like that) - Quora

response.answer_text: Nah, I am also desperate to encounter a zombie apocalypse in this real life. Although honestly, I know I won't probably survive or be able to protect myself for a long time but it's still worth the fight. Being in action during a zombie chase or just killing zombies has always been my dream, that's why I want to learn parkour and some basic survival tips, just in case this covid-19 turns dirty.
